select u.id, u.recharge_time, u.valid_time ,u.role_id,t.name,t.id as invite_id,o.trade_type,o.out_trade_no,a.total,c.text as roleText from user u left join user_order o on u.id = o.user_id left join user t on t.id = u.invite_id left join code_text c on u.role_id = c.code_id left join (select sum(m.total_fee) total, m.out_trade_no from menoy_info m
where DATE_FORMAT(m.end_time,'%y-%m-%d') BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{btime},'%y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(#{etime},'%y-%m-%d')
group by m.out_trade_no) a on a.out_trade_no = o.out_trade_no where o.out_trade_no is not null and a.total > 0
and o.trade_type =#{way}

select ct.code_id,r.tt as total,ct.text from code_text ct left join (select u.role_id,sum(a.total) tt from user u left join user_order o on u.id = o.user_id left join user t on t.id = u.invite_id left join (select sum(m.total_fee) total, m.out_trade_no from menoy_info m
where DATE_FORMAT(m.end_time,'%y-%m-%d') BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{btime},'%y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(#{etime},'%y-%m-%d')
group by m.out_trade_no) a on a.out_trade_no = o.out_trade_no where o.out_trade_no is not null and a.total > 0
and o.trade_type =#{way}
group by u.role_id )r on ct.code_id = r.role_id
